title: Cigotuvi's Putrefaction
data:
***Version [0.32](/0.32 "0.32")**: This article is up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of *Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup*.*

| [![Cigotuvi's putrefaction.png](/images/1/1b/Cigotuvi%27s_putrefaction.png)](/File:Cigotuvi%27s_putrefaction.png) Cigotuvi's Putrefaction |                                                                                                                |

| Level                                                                                                                                     | 4                                                                                                              |
| School1                                                                                                                                   | [Air](/Air_Magic "Air Magic")                                                                                  |
| School2                                                                                                                                   | [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy")                                                                         |
| Source(s)                                                                                                                                 | [Book of Decay](/Book_of_Decay "Book of Decay") [Trismegistus Codex](/Trismegistus_Codex "Trismegistus Codex") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                                                               | 4                                                                                                              |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                                                                 | 0                                                                                                              |
| Power Cap                                                                                                                                 | 100                                                                                                            |
| Range                                                                                                                                     | 5                                                                                                              |
| Hated By                                                                                                                                  | [Elyvilon](/Elyvilon "Elyvilon") [The Shining One](/The_Shining_One "The Shining One") [Zin](/Zin "Zin")       |
| Flags                                                                                                                                     | Target, Unclean                                                                                                |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Magically accelerates the decay of damaged living tissue, causing great clouds of miasma to billow forth from a targeted victim's wounds over several turns which may slow and heavily poison any living creature who stands in them. Air currents will prevent this pestilence from forming wherever the caster is standing, but they are not otherwise protected from its effects.This spell may only be cast on a living creature who is at least heavily wounded, and channelling such necrotic energies will leave the caster's own health temporarily drained (though spellpower will reduce the intensity of this side-effect). |

- *This page is a **[stub](/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. You could probably [expand this page](http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Cigotuvi%27s_Putrefaction\&action=edit) should you wish to do so.*

**Cigotuvi's Putrefaction** is a smite-targeted level 4 [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy")/[Air Magic](/Air_Magic "Air Magic") spell, which must be cast on a [living](/Category:Natural_holiness "Category:Natural holiness") monster that is at least 'heavily wounded'. It causes [miasma](/Miasma "Miasma") clouds to billow out from this monster over the next several turns. These clouds start as harmless 'faint miasma' that turn into proper miasma clouds the next turn. Faint miasma will never turn harmful so long as the player themselves is standing there (so no matter what terrain you create the clouds on, they won't hurt you - though it's still possible to surround yourself!)

The spell has a [draining](/Draining "Draining") cost, which is heavily reduced by spellpower.

## Useful Info

## Strategy

## History

- Added in [0.32](/0.32 "0.32") as the thematic replacement for [Cigotuvi's Dreadful Rot](/Cigotuvi%27s_Dreadful_Rot "Cigotuvi's Dreadful Rot").
html:
Cigotuvi's Putrefaction

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.32: This article is up to date for the latest stable release of Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup.
 Cigotuvi's Putrefaction
Level 4
School1 Air
School2 Necromancy
Source(s) Book of Decay
Trismegistus Codex
Casting noise 4
Spell noise 0
Power Cap 100
Range 5
Hated By Elyvilon
The Shining One
Zin
Flags Target, Unclean
Magically accelerates the decay of damaged living tissue, causing great clouds of miasma to billow forth from a targeted victim's wounds over several turns which may slow and heavily poison any living creature who stands in them. Air currents will prevent this pestilence from forming wherever the caster is standing, but they are not otherwise protected from its effects.

This spell may only be cast on a living creature who is at least heavily wounded, and channelling such necrotic energies will leave the caster's own health temporarily drained (though spellpower will reduce the intensity of this side-effect).

This page is a stub. You could probably expand this page should you wish to do so.

Cigotuvi's Putrefaction is a smite-targeted level 4 Necromancy/Air Magic spell, which must be cast on a living monster that is at least 'heavily wounded'. It causes miasma clouds to billow out from this monster over the next several turns. These clouds start as harmless 'faint miasma' that turn into proper miasma clouds the next turn. Faint miasma will never turn harmful so long as the player themselves is standing there (so no matter what terrain you create the clouds on, they won't hurt you - though it's still possible to surround yourself!)

The spell has a draining cost, which is heavily reduced by spellpower.

Useful Info

Strategy

History

  • Added in 0.32 as the thematic replacement for Cigotuvi's Dreadful Rot.
